abstract: Wall Street fought back from early losses to close slightly higher on Thursday, even as economic reports sent up more distress flares about the widening recession.
snippet: Wall Street fought back from early losses to close slightly higher on Thursday, even as economic reports sent up more distress flares about the widening recession.
lead_paragraph: Despite a rout in financial stocks, Wall Street fought back from early losses to close slightly higher on Thursday, even as economic reports sent up more distress flares about the widening recession.

headline.main: Shares Gain Despite Big Banks’ Slide
headline.print_headline: Shares Gain Despite Big Banks’ Slide
